pageContext.claim: Andrew Gillum "ran Tallahassee into the ground. Highest murder rate they've ever.‚Äù
pageContext.analysis: There was a one-year spike in murders in 2017 in Leon County but just about every other number fell, for a decline in overall crime of 15 percent, according to FBI records. Violent crime in Leon County decreased 11 percent from 2014-2017 and Property Crime decreased 1 percent in that same time, according to Florida records.
